c74object.name: mxp1
c74object.digest: Generate rhythms by interference of two periodicities
c74object.description: mxp1 generates and outputs a rhythmical pattern from the interference of two synchronized monomial periodicities (generators), according to Chapter 2 "Interferences of Periodicities", Book 1 "The Theory of Rhythm" of "The Schillinger system of musical composition". In other words, it generates a simple polyrhythm of a over b.

method.name: gen
method.description: The gen message generates and outputs a rhythmical pattern from the interference of two synchronized monomial periodicities (generators). The periodicity of the generators must be included as arguments to this message. The syntax is thus: gen gena (int) genb (int).

method.name: bang
method.description: Outputs the resulting patterns calculated from the arguments or gen message.
